titles.title: Strengthening Domestic Nuclear Security Act of 2014
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to strengthen the Domestic Nuclear Detection Office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies.

committee.subcommittee: Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies
committee.name: House Homeland Security
